verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: Just like Iran] , [ARG1: Kim Jong - Un] [V: comes] [ARG4: to the negotiation table] [ARGM-MNR: in a weak position] [ARGM-TMP: following President Trump 's big recent foreign policy decisions] .
